zone.line: Are hovering on my lips unlike the voice
With which our pallid race hold ghastly talk
In darkness? and proud Sufferer who art thou?
Tremendous image, as thou art must be
Him whom thou shadowest forth. I am his foe
The Titan. speak the words which I would hear
Although no thought inform thine empty voice
Listen! and though your echoes must be mute
Grey mountains & old woods & haunted springs

line.del: and though ye weep, rejoicing know
our strong curse cannot be unfulfilled.

zone.line: A spirit seizes me, & speaks within
It tears me as fire tears a thunder-cloud!
Look how he lifts his mighty looks, the Heaven
